text:
01 of 14 REX/Shutterstock At a London reception celebrating young leaders from around the Commonwealth, the Duchess of Sussex went bright (and sleeveless!) in a yellow sheath dress by Brandon Maxwell paired with classic nude pumps. Get the Look! Gabrielle Union Collection - Yellow Halter Sweater Dress, $80; nyandcompany.com Calvin Klein Starburst Sheath Dress, $89; macys.com Black Label by Evan Picone Sleeveless Sheath Dress, $43 (orig. $74); jcpenney.com Sam Edelman Hazel Pointy Toe Pump, $120; nordstrom.com Steve Madden Daisie, $90-$100; stevemadden.com Gap Nude Suede Pumps, $80; gap.com

04 of 14 Samir Hussein/WireImage At her Royal Ascot debut, the duchess donned a white shirtdress by her wedding gown designer, Givenchy, along with a black belt, black pumps, a black clutch, and a Philip Treacy hat. Get the Look! Nasty Gal Love Shirts Maxi Dress, $48 (orig. $80); nastygal.com Donna Karan Cotton Button-Down Shirtdress, $125; lordandtaylor.com Pure Navy Button-Front Maxi Shirt Dress, $49 (orig. $99); gilt.com Madewell Leather Crisscross Skinny Belt, $45; shopbop.com Tahari Parson Pointed Toe Pump, $60 (orig. $99); nordstromrack.com Sam Edelman Dori Pump, $120; nordstrom.com Barney's New York Leather Minaudiere, $195; barneys.com Lenore by La Regale Sparkle Pleated Jacquard Minaudiere, $84; kohls.com Whittall & Shon Fascinator Derby Hat, $81 (orig. $120); jcpenney.com Award Design Wedding Hat, $150; etsy.com

05 of 14 BAV/Geoff Robinson Meghan chose a floral Oscar de la Renta maxi dress with a white fascinator and pumps for the nuptials of Princess Diana's niece, Celia McCorquodal. Get the Look! Yumi Kim Woodstock Maxi Dress, $258; yumikim.com Willow & Clay Wrap Maxi Dress, $149; nordstrom.com Calvin Klein Floral-Print Chiffon Maxi Dress, $139; macys.com Saferin Fascinator Hat, $14; amazon.com Calvin Klein Ronna Pointy Toe Pump, $100; nordstrom.com Sam Edelman Ludlow Slingback Pumps,$110; shopbop.com

06 of 14 Tim Rooke/REX/Shutterstock For her first solo outing with Queen Elizabeth, Meghan wore a custom beige Givenchy cape dress, black pumps by Sarah Flint, and carried a bespoke Givenchy clutch. Get the Look! Connected Lace Capelet Dress, $89; macys.com Boohoo Molly Cape Tailored Belted Midi Dress, $21; boohoo.com Donna Morgan Crepe Shift Dress with Long Sleeve Slit Detail, $118; zappos.com J.Crew Skinny Italian Leather Belt, $35; jcrew.com Nine West Fifth Pointy Toe Pump, $63; nordstrom.com Calvin Klein Women's Rizzo Pumps, $119; macys.com Bloomingdale's Women's Margo Italian Leather Pointed Toe Pumps, $149; bloomingdales.com

07 of 14 Max Mumby/Indigo/Getty Meghan looked lovely — and spurred a mini controversy — in off-the-shoulder Carolina Herrera Trooping the Colour dress. Get the Look! ASOS Tux Cold Shoulder Button Front Midi Dress, $53 (orig. $76); asos.com AX Paris Women's Off The Shoulder Fishtail Dress, $35; amazon.com Eliza J Off-the-Shoulder Sheath Dress, $83 (orig. $138); dillards.com Xscape Off-The-Shoulder Sheath Dress, $109; macys.com

09 of 14 Mark Cuthbert/UK Press via Getty Winter white works in the springtime, too! Meghan's lightwhite white wrap coat, which she wore for her engagement photo call with Prince Harry in November 2017, is perfect for those warmer temperatures. Get the Look: ASOS Belted 80's Coat With Batwing Sleeve, $108; asos.com Mango Buttoned Wool Coat, $200; mango.com French Connection Marla Coat w/ D-Ring Belt, $35; 6pm.com

11 of 14 Meghan Markle and Prince Harry. Splash News Online Meghan wore a classic oversized button-down for her first public outing with Harry to the Invictus Games in Toronto. Get the Look: Madewell White Cotton Courier Shirt, $65; madewell.com J.Crew Slim Perfect Shirt In Piece-dyed Irish Linen, $80; jcrew.com H&M Cotton Shirt, $20; hm.com

12 of 14 Danny Lawson/PA Images/Getty Images For the Invictus Games opening ceremonies, Meghan wore a chic burgundy leather jacket — perfect for a cooler spring evening. Get the Look: Kenneth Cole New York PU Moto, $135; 6pm.com Mango Suede Biker Jacket, $150; mango.com Levi's Faux Leather Moto Jacket, $78; nordstrom.com

13 of 14 Source: Meghan Markle/Instagram For a trip to Spain pre-Harry with pals Markus Anderson and Misha Nonoo, Meghan rocked a simple off-the-shoulder dress. Get the Look: Brigitte Bailey Finley Off the Shoulder Raw-Edge Striped Dress, $22; 6pm.com 1.STATE Off Shoulder Shift Dress with Tassel, $119; zappos.com BP Stripe Off the Shoulder Dress, $49; nordstrom.com
authors: Diana Pearl Is A Former Writer
Reporter At People. She Left People In
title: How to Shop the Best of Meghan Markle's (Budget-Friendly!) Spring Style

meta_data.description: Spring is coming — and Meghan Markle is providing lots of style inspiration for the new season
meta_data.sailthru.author: Diana Pearl
